Home.title: Kraftjar - as for yourself
Home.description: We will change your approach to finding specialists and tasks in all areas. Download Kraftjar today and find answers to all your needs

search.title: What can I find?
search.description: We will change your approach to finding specialists and tasks in all areas. Download Kraftjar today and find answers to all your needs

categories.title: What can I find?
categories.description: Thanks to the fast search algorithm, Kraftjar helps you find specialists in the shortest possible time

fast.title: Fast search
fast.description: Kraftjar offers a fast and efficient way to find specialists in any field. Just enter your needs and the app will find you the right professionals in your area

opportunities.title: Expanding opportunities
opportunities.description: We help specialists find new tasks and expand the client base, and customers quickly find qualified specialists

quality.title: Quality guarantee
quality.description: We provide a guarantee of quality and safety for both parties, which allows customers to be sure of the quality of services

about.title: Find an Expert or Find a Task from Crafters
about.description: Kraftjar is your reliable assistant in finding specialists in any field or finding new tasks. Download the app right now and conveniently search and order wherever you are!

expertsFeed.title: Finding a Kraftjar experts is now easier!
expertsFeed.description: Thanks to the fast search algorithm, Kraftjar helps you find experts in the shortest possible time

instruction.title: How to start?
instruction.description: Download the app right now to start using all the benefits of Kraftjar and find professionals or tasks according to your request
instruction.firstStep: Open the app store on your device and search for the Kraftjar app
instruction.secondStep: After finding the app, click the Install button and wait for the installation process to complete
instruction.thirdStep: Open the Kraftjar application, register and search for specialists or tasks that interest you

first.question: How to add a new task or project?
first.answer: To add a new task or project, you need to register in the Kraftjar app, enter all the necessary data and click the 'Add Task' button

second.question: How to set prices for your services or project?
second.answer: To set prices for your services or project, you need to register in the Kraftjar app, enter all the necessary data and click the 'Add Task' button

third.question: Is it possible to cancel or modify an already created task?
third.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify an already created task, to do this you need to go to your profile, select the task you want to cancel or modify, and click the appropriate button

fourth.question: Is it possible to cancel or modify an already created task?
fourth.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify an already created task, to do this you need to go to your profile, select the task you want to cancel or modify, and click the appropriate button

fifth.question: How to add a new task or project?
fifth.answer: To add a new task or project, you need to register in the Kraftjar app, enter all the necessary data and click the 'Add Task' button
